/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in hues of beige and white, are adorned with numerous windows that reflect the clear blue sky above. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and bicycles parked along its sides, hinting at the daily life and movement of the city's inhabitants. In the distance, trees add a touch of green to the urban landscape, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of vibrancy and energy, characteristic of a thriving metropolis.
